code: import{SET_PERSONLIST,ADD_PERSONLIST,DELETE_PERSONLIST,UPDATE_PERSONLIST,SET_FORMDATA}from"./actions-types";export var setPersonList=function setPersonList(list){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_PERSONLIST,payload:list});};};export var addPersonList=function addPersonList(person){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ADD_PERSONLIST,payload:person});};};export var deletePersonList=function deletePersonList(index){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:DELETE_PERSONLIST,payload:index});};};export var updatePersonList=function updatePersonList(index,responseData){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_PERSONLIST,payload:[index,responseData]});};};export var setFormData=function setFormData(name,value){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_FORMDATA,payload:[name,value]});};};
